trans-unit.source: Attempts to keep a specified window active during Send().

seg-source.mrk: Attempts to keep a specified window active during Send().

target.mrk: Attempts to keep a specified window active during Send().

trans-unit.source: The title/hWnd/class of the window to activate. See Title special definition. Use a blank title to disable the function.

seg-source.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to activate.
Use a blank title to disable the function.

target.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to activate.
Use a blank title to disable the function.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The text of the window. . Default is an empty string. See Text special definition.
Using SendKeepActive("") attempts to reset the active window in between each simulated keystroke from Send().

seg-source.mrk: Using SendKeepActive("") attempts to reset the active window in between each simulated keystroke from Send().

target.mrk: Using SendKeepActive("") attempts to reset the active window in between each simulated keystroke from Send().

trans-unit.source: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

seg-source.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

target.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

trans-unit.source: Keep the Notepad window active when using the Send function.

seg-source.mrk: Keep the Notepad window active when using the Send function.

target.mrk: Keep the Notepad window active when using the Send function.

trans-unit.source: Simulate entering a string of text. If you try to change to a different window other than Notepad, then the Notepad window will

seg-source.mrk: Simulate entering a string of text.
If you try to change to a different window other than Notepad, then the Notepad window will

target.mrk: Simulate entering a string of text.
If you try to change to a different window other than Notepad, then the Notepad window will

trans-unit.source: Disable the Notepad window being active when using the Send function.

seg-source.mrk: Disable the Notepad window being active when using the Send function.

target.mrk: Disable the Notepad window being active when using the Send function.

trans-unit.source: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

target.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

trans-unit.source: Now a screen will pop up and ask to save the changes, the classname of the window is called

seg-source.mrk: Now a screen will pop up and ask to save the changes, the classname of the window is called

target.mrk: Now a screen will pop up and ask to save the changes, the classname of the window is called

trans-unit.source: "#32770" and simulating the "TAB" key to move to the second button in which the "ENTER" is simulated to not "save the file"
